_sText:
**About** - This is my first map. Made it like 3 years ago. Doesn't mean it's bad. This is my most played dodgeball map. Hope you enjoy it!

**Bugs** - When you turn your flashlight on it cuts the map in half and shows you the skybox. I have no idea what thats all about.

**Requirements** - Server running a dodgeball script. Map will not work without one.

**Cool Features** - After 30 seconds or so the map pushes everyone out of spawn to stop AFKers and whatnot. 

**Future Version Plans** - I'm planning on creating a bunch of maps using this as a template. Having different textures and scenes in the background.

**Installation** - Extract map file to Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

**P.S.** - Make sure to visit [AoDCommunity.com](http://AoDCommunity.com "AoDCommunity.com")
